title: person raising hand: medium-light skin tone

verbs: To express something by a gesture or gestures.
To say or express through gestures.

To show, express or direct through movements.

A person, especially as one among many.

A human; someone susceptible to death.

A human being.
A person that will die eventually.
A being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood

Some person.
An individual; usually a human being.
Young female human
A young female human; (in contrast to boy), a female child or young adult.
A title of respect for a young woman (usually unmarried) with or without a name used.
A young female person, usually a child or teenager.
A young woman
A young girl.
A girl is any female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.

A young female; miss.
That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).
The part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.
The zoological term for the distal portion of the forelimb of an animal (including the human hand)
Part of the fore limb.
The (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.
A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.
A hand is a prehensile, multi-fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates such as humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.
The use of movements, especially of the hands, to communicate familiar or prearranged signals
A gesture is a form of non-verbal communication or non-vocal communication in which visible bodily actions communicate particular messages, either in place of, or in conjunction with, speech.
Form of non-verbal communication or non-vocal communication
A quick movement of a finger or pen on a screen that the computer interprets as a command, rather than as a mouse movement, writing, or drawing.
The use of movements (especially of the hands) to communicate familiar or prearranged signals
A polite name for any woman

description: This version of the  Person Raising Hand emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person raising their hand emoji features a friendly individual with a medium-light skin tone, their arm extended upwards with a slight, cheerful bend. The smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges of Apple's design language imbue the figure with an approachable and optimistic feel. This emoji conveys enthusiasm, a desire to participate, or a polite way of asking a question, all rendered with the signature polished look found on Apple products.
